##Conducting PCA on the continuous variables
```{r}
library("factoextra")
library("dplyr")
contData <- trainData %>%
        select(where(is.numeric))

str(contData)
dataM = as.matrix(contData)
dataMat = as.matrix(dataM) %*% t(dataM)
## standardizing the data
dataMat = scale(dataMat)
mean(dataMat[, 1])
sd(dataMat[, 1]) #checking to make sure it's standardized
pca_data = princomp(dataMat)
#summary(pca_data)
fviz_eig(pca_data, addlabels = TRUE)
plot(pca_data$loadings[, 1],
     pca_data$loadings[, 2], 
     xlab='loadings 1', 
     ylab='loadings 2',
     main='PCA on data')
```
